016/**

029 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>response</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.SetPumpSoundsResponse}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
030 * </table>
031 */
032@MessageProps(
033    opCode=-28,
034    size=9,
035    type=MessageType.REQUEST,
036    characteristic=Characteristic.CONTROL,
037    signed=true,
038    response=SetPumpSoundsResponse.class
039)
040public class SetPumpSoundsRequest extends Message {
041    private int quickBolusAnnunRaw;
042    private int generalAnnunRaw;
043    private int reminderAnnunRaw;
044    private int alertAnnunRaw;
045    private int alarmAnnunRaw;
046    private int cgmAlertAnnunA;
047    private int cgmAlertAnnunB;
048    private int changeBitmaskRaw;
049
050    private PumpGlobalsResponse.AnnunciationEnum quickBolusAnnun;
051    private PumpGlobalsResponse.AnnunciationEnum generalAnnun;
052    private PumpGlobalsResponse.AnnunciationEnum reminderAnnun;
053    private PumpGlobalsResponse.AnnunciationEnum alertAnnun;
054    private PumpGlobalsResponse.AnnunciationEnum alarmAnnun;
055    private CgmAlertAnnunciationEnum cgmAlertAnnun;
056    private Set<ChangeBitmask> changeBitmask;
057
058    public SetPumpSoundsRequest() {}
059
060    public SetPumpSoundsRequest(int quickBolusAnnunRaw, int generalAnnunRaw, int reminderAnnunRaw, int alertAnnunRaw, int alarmAnnunRaw, int cgmAlertAnnunA, int cgmAlertAnnunB, int changeBitmaskRaw) {
061        this.cargo = buildCargo(quickBolusAnnunRaw, generalAnnunRaw, reminderAnnunRaw, alertAnnunRaw, alarmAnnunRaw, cgmAlertAnnunA, cgmAlertAnnunB, changeBitmaskRaw);
062        parse(cargo);
063    }
064
065    public SetPumpSoundsRequest(byte[] raw) {
066        parse(raw);
067    }

069    /**
070     * <table border="1">
071     * <caption>Parsed fields for SetPumpSoundsRequest:</caption>
072     * <tr><td><code>quickBolusAnnunRaw</code></td><td><code>raw[1]</code></td></tr>
073     * <tr><td><code>generalAnnunRaw</code></td><td><code>raw[2]</code></td></tr>
074     * <tr><td><code>reminderAnnunRaw</code></td><td><code>raw[3]</code></td></tr>
075     * <tr><td><code>alertAnnunRaw</code></td><td><code>raw[4]</code></td></tr>
076     * <tr><td><code>alarmAnnunRaw</code></td><td><code>raw[5]</code></td></tr>
077     * <tr><td><code>cgmAlertAnnunA</code></td><td><code>raw[6]</code></td></tr>
078     * <tr><td><code>cgmAlertAnnunB</code></td><td><code>raw[7]</code></td></tr>
079     * <tr><td><code>changeBitmaskRaw</code></td><td><code>raw[8]</code></td></tr>
080     * <tr><td><code>quickBolusAnnun</code></td><td><code>PumpGlobalsResponse.AnnunciationEnum.fromId(quickBolusAnnunRaw)</code></td></tr>
081     * <tr><td><code>generalAnnun</code></td><td><code>PumpGlobalsResponse.AnnunciationEnum.fromId(generalAnnunRaw)</code></td></tr>

083     * <tr><td><code>alertAnnun</code></td><td><code>PumpGlobalsResponse.AnnunciationEnum.fromId(alertAnnunRaw)</code></td></tr>
084     * <tr><td><code>alarmAnnun</code></td><td><code>PumpGlobalsResponse.AnnunciationEnum.fromId(alarmAnnunRaw)</code></td></tr>
085     * <tr><td><code>cgmAlertAnnun</code></td><td><code>CgmAlertAnnunciationEnum.fromIds(cgmAlertAnnunA, cgmAlertAnnunB)</code></td></tr>
086     * <tr><td><code>changeBitmask</code></td><td><code>ChangeBitmask.fromBitmask(changeBitmaskRaw)</code></td></tr>
087     * </table>
088     */
089    public void parse(byte[] raw) { 
090        raw = this.removeSignedRequestHmacBytes(raw);
091        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
092        this.cargo = raw;
093        this.quickBolusAnnunRaw = raw[1];
094        this.generalAnnunRaw = raw[2];
095        this.reminderAnnunRaw = raw[3];
096        this.alertAnnunRaw = raw[4];
097        this.alarmAnnunRaw = raw[5];
098        this.cgmAlertAnnunA = raw[6];
099        this.cgmAlertAnnunB = raw[7];
100        this.changeBitmaskRaw = raw[8];
101
102        this.quickBolusAnnun = PumpGlobalsResponse.AnnunciationEnum.fromId(quickBolusAnnunRaw);
103        this.generalAnnun = PumpGlobalsResponse.AnnunciationEnum.fromId(generalAnnunRaw);
104        this.reminderAnnun = PumpGlobalsResponse.AnnunciationEnum.fromId(reminderAnnunRaw);
105        this.alertAnnun = PumpGlobalsResponse.AnnunciationEnum.fromId(alertAnnunRaw);
106        this.alarmAnnun = PumpGlobalsResponse.AnnunciationEnum.fromId(alarmAnnunRaw);
107        this.cgmAlertAnnun = CgmAlertAnnunciationEnum.fromIds(cgmAlertAnnunA, cgmAlertAnnunB);
108        this.changeBitmask = ChangeBitmask.fromBitmask(changeBitmaskRaw);
109        
110    }

113    /**
114     * <table border="1">
115     * <caption>Byte layout for SetPumpSoundsRequest.buildCargo(...):</caption>
116     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>

125     * <tr><td>8</td><td><code>(byte) changeBitmask</code></td></tr>
126     * </table>
127     */
128    public static byte[] buildCargo(int quickBolusAnnunRaw, int generalAnnunRaw, int reminderAnnunRaw, int alertAnnunRaw, int alarmAnnunRaw, int cgmAlertAnnunA, int cgmAlertAnnunB, int changeBitmask) {
129        return Bytes.combine(
130            new byte[]{0},
131            new byte[]{ (byte) quickBolusAnnunRaw },
132            new byte[]{ (byte) generalAnnunRaw },
133            new byte[]{ (byte) reminderAnnunRaw },
134            new byte[]{ (byte) alertAnnunRaw },
135            new byte[]{ (byte) alarmAnnunRaw },
136            new byte[]{ (byte) cgmAlertAnnunA },
137            new byte[]{ (byte) cgmAlertAnnunB },
138            new byte[]{ (byte) changeBitmask }
139
140        );
141    }

196    public enum CgmAlertAnnunciationEnum {
197        VIBRATE(0, 0),
198        BEEP(0, 2),
199        HYPO_REPEAT(0, 3),
200
201        ;
202
203        private final int idA;
204        private final int idB;
205        CgmAlertAnnunciationEnum(int idA, int idB) {
206            this.idA = idA;
207            this.idB = idB;
208        }
209
210        public String toString() {
211            return name();
212        }
213
214        public static CgmAlertAnnunciationEnum fromIds(int idA, int idB) {
215            for (CgmAlertAnnunciationEnum i : CgmAlertAnnunciationEnum.values()) {
216                if (i.idA == idA && i.idB == idB) {
217                    return i;
218                }
219            }
220            return null;
221        }
222    }
223
224    public CgmAlertAnnunciationEnum getCgmAlertAnnun() {
225        return cgmAlertAnnun;
226    }
227
228    public enum ChangeBitmask {
229        QUICK_BOLUS(2),
230        GENERAL(4),
231        REMINDER(8),
232        ALERT(16),
233        ALARM(32),
234        CGM_ALERT(64),
235
236
237        ;
238
239        private final int id;
240
241        ChangeBitmask(int id) {
242            this.id = id;
243        }
244
245        public int id() {
246            return id;
247        }
248
249        public static Set<ChangeBitmask> fromBitmask(int bitmask) {
250            Set<ChangeBitmask> set = new TreeSet<>();
251            for (ChangeBitmask i : values()) {
252                if (bitmask % i.id() == 0) {
253                    set.add(i);
254                }
255            }
256
257            return set;
258        }
259
260        public static int toBitmask(ChangeBitmask... items) {
261            int mask = 0;
262            for (ChangeBitmask i : items) {
263                mask += i.id();
264            }
265
266            return mask;
267        }
268    }
269
270    public Set<ChangeBitmask> getChangeBitmask() {
271        return changeBitmask;
272    }
